record.dc:creator: Pett, Daniel
record.dc:description: Dataset consisting of images created for the purpose of generating a 3D model of 'Portrait Bust of a Man', a bronze bust of the Augustan period of the Roman Empire, now housed in the Cleveland Museum of Art
